description:
The five boys watch DVD`s at Kaname`s home on Christmas.
Having watched all the movies they rented, the boys return to the rental store to rent some more.
They expected to have an uneventful day, but a certain incident leads to them dressing up as Santa Claus and helping out with a shopping mall event.
On top of that, "Akira" arrives dressed as Santa as well.
Source: crunchyroll
